nodes.text: Dust farmers were agricultural workers on a planet near the moon Raspar-6. After a nuclear blast on Raspar-6, the farmers were advised to use hydroponics in fribulation tanks for some time, which could last until mid-Aint or early Nnters.

Dust farmer was mentioned in Monsters and Aliens from George Lucas, a book published in 1993. Lucasfilm employee Leland Chee, who maintains the Holocron continuity database, has indicated that information contained in the book is non-canonical.
